createTables.createCategoriesTable: CREATE TABLE categories (id serial, category_name varchar(50) NOT NULL, category_id serial, category_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL UNIQUE, category_description text, category_start_date timestamp with time zone, category_image_name varchar(1000), category_image oid, CONSTRAINT pk_category_id PRIMARY KEY (category_id), CHECK (category_position_in_list > 0));
createTables.createSubcategoriesTable: CREATE TABLE subcategories (id serial, subcategory_name varchar(50) NOT NULL, subcategory_id serial, subcategory_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL UNIQUE, subcategory_description text, subcategory_start_date timestamp with time zone, subcategory_image_name varchar(1000), subcategory_image oid, subcategory_parent_id bigint REFERENCES categories(category_id), CONSTRAINT pk_subcategory_id PRIMARY KEY (subcategory_id), CHECK (subcategory_position_in_list > 0));
createTables.createSliderTable: CREATE TABLE slider (id serial, slider_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL UNIQUE, slider_name varchar(2500), slider_description varchar(2500), slider_url varchar(2500), slider_display bool DEFAULT(TRUE), slider_id serial, slider_image_name varchar(1000) NOT NULL UNIQUE, slider_image oid NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_slider_id PRIMARY KEY (slider_id));
